name: qdelaunay
author: AFNI Team
description: Compute the Delaunay triangulation using Qhull.

inputs.description: Input file containing point coordinates.
inputs.name: Input file

inputs.description: Compute furthest-site Delaunay triangulation
inputs.name: Furthest-site Delaunay flag

inputs.description: Triangulated output
inputs.name: Triangulated output flag

inputs.description: Joggled input instead of merged facets
inputs.name: Joggled input flag

inputs.description: Randomly joggle input in range [-n,n]
inputs.name: Joggle range

inputs.description: Search all points for the initial simplex
inputs.name: Search simplex flag

inputs.description: Add point-at-infinity to Delaunay triangulation
inputs.name: Point-at-infinity flag

inputs.description: Print Delaunay region if visible from point n, -n if not
inputs.name: Delaunay region visibility

inputs.description: Print Delaunay regions that include point n, -n if not
inputs.name: Delaunay regions inclusion

inputs.description: Trace at level n, 4=all, 5=mem/gauss, -1= events
inputs.name: Trace level

inputs.description: Check frequently during execution
inputs.name: Check frequently flag

inputs.description: Print statistics
inputs.name: Print statistics flag

inputs.description: Verify result: structure, convexity, and in-circle test
inputs.name: Verify result flag

inputs.description: Send all output to stdout
inputs.name: Output to stdout flag

inputs.description: Report summary when n or more facets created
inputs.name: Facets summary

inputs.description: Input data from file, no spaces or single quotes
inputs.name: Input option file

inputs.description: Output results to file, may be enclosed in single quotes
inputs.name: Output option file

inputs.description: Turn on tracing when point n added to hull
inputs.name: Trace point flag

inputs.description: Turn on tracing at merge n
inputs.name: Trace merge flag

inputs.description: Trace merge facets when width > n
inputs.name: Trace merge width flag

inputs.description: Stop Qhull after adding point n, -n for before
inputs.name: Stop at point flag

inputs.description: Stop Qhull after building cone for point n
inputs.name: Stop at cone point flag

inputs.description: Radius of centrum (roundoff added). Merge facets if non-convex
inputs.name: Centrum radius

inputs.description: Cosine of maximum angle. Merge facets if cosine > n or non-convex
inputs.name: Maximum angle cosine

inputs.description: Randomly perturb computations by a factor of [1-n,1+n]
inputs.name: Perturb factor

inputs.description: Min facet width for outside point (before roundoff)
inputs.name: Min facet width

inputs.description: Facet dump
inputs.name: Facet dump flag

inputs.description: Geomview output
inputs.name: Geomview flag

inputs.description: Vertices incident to each Delaunay region
inputs.name: Vertices incident flag

inputs.description: Mathematica output (2-d only, lifted to a paraboloid)
inputs.name: Mathematica flag

inputs.description: OFF format (dim, points, and facets as a paraboloid)
inputs.name: OFF format flag

inputs.description: Point coordinates (lifted to a paraboloid)
inputs.name: Point coordinates flag

inputs.description: Summary (stderr)
inputs.name: Summary flag
